title: Tolkappiyam
author: Tolkappiyar
excerpt: The earliest extant Tamil grammatical work, covering phonology, morphology, syntax, and poetics.

title: Silappadikaram
author: Ilango Adigal
excerpt: An epic that narrates the tragic tale of Kannagi and Kovalan, symbolizing justice and dharma.

title: Manimekalai
author: Sattanar
excerpt: A continuation of Silappadikaram, focusing on Buddhist philosophy and moral teachings.

title: Purananuru
author: Multiple Sangam Poets
excerpt: A collection of 400 poems describing war, kingship, valor, and the ethics of ancient Tamil society.

title: Thirukkural
author: Thiruvalluvar
excerpt: One of the most celebrated Tamil classics, consisting of 1330 couplets on ethics, polity, and love.

title: Naladiyar
author: Anonymous
excerpt: A didactic Tamil text of moral aphorisms composed in quatrains, part of post-Sangam literature.

title: Paripadal
author: Multiple Sangam Poets
excerpt: A Sangam anthology of devotional poems dedicated to Vishnu, Murugan, and the Vaigai river.
